Address.value: 5114 BUFORD HIGHWAY,SUITE 109, DORAVILLE, Georgia, 30340, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: MetroCity Bankshares Inc is a holding company of its subsidiary Metro City Bank. It provides commercial banking services such as consumer and commercial checking accounts, savings accounts, certificates of deposits, commercial and consumer loans, money transfers and a variety of other banking services. The banks generate revenue from interest income. Its customers include small business owners, professionals, consumers, and real estate developers.

value.name: Howard Hwasaeng Kim
value.title: COO, Director, Chief Lending Officer & EVP
